39367439.review:
今天上午刚开始玩，玩起来太爽快了，没想到3个多小时就打通了一周目。

一开始是冲着洞穴物语的作者来的，游戏本身的素质超乎我的意料。

用的是手柄玩，默认键位不习惯，改了以后顺手很多，里面的怪物和关卡设计都非常棒，主角使用的四种枪各有特点，在不同的地方用不同的枪有奇效，手感也超棒的，游戏一周目难度也很亲切，玩起来就停不下来了。另外，游戏的剧情很简单，挺萌的。

总的来说，是一款不可多得的平台射击类闯关游戏。

不说了，我去打加班模式了，清理怪物真有意思(｀・ω・´)

39300419.review:

39237737.review: Милейшая аркадка от создателя Cave Story. Ожидал, что будет чуть менее аркадной, но она и так хороша.

39131878.review: I totally underestimated this game. At first it looks like your typical platformer. A bit difficult sometimes. People who play this game only once will probably never see the true value of this game since it requires you to replay the 3 times. And it isnt even boring to do so! the storyline completely changes in the 2nd and 3rd playthrough.

39075787.review:
Esse jogo é meio que uma continuação de pink hour, um jogo pesadamente inspirado em jogos de master system ou nintendinho e que lembra um pouco também cave story. esse jogo indie foi feito por uma equipe japonesa. Ele é 2d, vc pula, e atira e anda e é isso. Você tem 4 tipos de armas que pode pegar durante o jogo, todas elas podem ser melhoradas. O problema é o que o preço pra melhorar é muito caro então você vai ter grindar muito pq as últimas fases são muito dificeis se você usar armas com o level baixo. Minha dica é upar só a primeira e a segunda arma. As duas últimas não são boas. O jogo tem 7 fases, cada uma com um tema diferente. Você controla um sapo totalmente mudo e sem personalidade. Quem conta a história são os sidekicks, a presidente, a protagonista gordinha rosa do pink hour e o gato preto cientista que te teleporta para as fases. O jogo foi totalmente traduzido pra português brasileiro, e nem precisa mudar nenhuma opção, se o seu steam estiver em pt-br o jogo já vai abrir no nosso idioma. 
Esse jogo apesar de bom e começar fácil até demais, sofre de um problema que eu imaginava que ele iria ter. Ele fica dificil demais. Se você não farmar dinheiro você provavelmente não vai terminar ele. Isso é muito chato, pois quebra o ritmo do jogo, quem estiver gostando da historinha simples dele e quiser ver mais, vai ter que parar e farmar moedas durante horas. Esse pra mim foi um ponto negativo muito grave. Eu entendo porque eles fizeram isso, um jogo de 20 reais não dá pra simplesmente ser terminado em 2 horas. mas estender com grinding é muita sacanagem. 
De forma geral achei ele decepcionante, eu esperava muito mais dele depois de jogar o pink hour( o proprio pink hour, fazia propaganda desse jogo), a maior decepção de todas foi terem não dado personalidade pro sapo. todas os personagens do jogo falam, menos ele.
Enfim eu sou 3 estrelas pra ele. Se você gosta de jogos retro bonitinhos, compre ele.

38745628.review:
Kero Blaster est un [i]run and gun[/i] réalisé par l'auteur de Cave Story où l'on joue une grenouille qui travaille dans une entreprise d'extermination. Malgré ses mécaniques mélangeant jeu de plateformes et jeu de tir, l'atmosphère et le rythme du jeu sont assez éloignés des classiques du genre comme Contra ou Gunstar Heroes et se rapprochent davantage de l'adaptation de Ghostbusters sur Mega Drive ou de Liquid Kids en salles d'arcade, c'est-à-dire que le jeu est assez lent, méthodique et posé, misant beaucoup sur le charme de son univers.

La progression est ici strictement linéaire, les sept niveaux du jeu se parcourant à peu près en ligne droite, avec quelques coffres remplis d'argent dissimulés ça et là. À la fin de chacun des quatre premiers niveaux, notre grenouille obtiendra une nouvelle arme, ou un jetpack à l'aide duquel elle pourra effectuer des doubles sauts. La structure des niveaux est assez classique, avec un boss à la fin, de nombreux petits ennemis et des mini-boss en cours de route, et au milieu, un magasin qui vend des améliorations pour nos armes ou notre niveau de santé.

Kero Blaster est assez [i]old school:[/i] son style graphique, très propre, rappelle beaucoup la NES, et quand on perd toutes nos vies (on en a peu), on doit recommencer le niveau depuis son tout début (fort heureusement, les mini-boss tués restent tués, et on garde les améliorations achetées en magasin et l'argent collecté). On ne peut viser qu'en haut et sur les côtés, sans visée en diagonale ou vers le bas, mais on peut continuer de tirer dans la même direction en laissant le bouton de feu appuyé. Les sauts de notre grenouille sont quant à eux assez rigides, rappelant un peu le premier Super Mario Bros. sur NES (mais sans bouton d'accélération). Cette maniabilité un peu raide peut sembler rébarbative sur le papier, mais le [i]level design[/i] de Kero Blaster est conçu tout entier autour d'elle, et c'est en réalité le gros point fort du jeu, ou en tout cas celui que j'ai de loin le plus apprécié.

Après avoir battu les sept niveaux principaux, une autre quête de sept niveaux se débloquera (le "Zangyou Mode", que l'on peut traduire par "Mode Heures Supplémentaires"), reprenant les mêmes types d'environnements mais avec un nouveau [i]level design,[/i] une difficulté accrue, et une nouvelle histoire. Que ce soit dans ce mode ou dans le mode original, la difficulté est plutôt bien conçue mais elle est inégale, avec des pointes de difficulté brusques où l'on peut se faire tuer en un coup lors de certains passages de jeu de plateformes ou lors des combats de boss, rendant l'absence de [i]checkpoints[/i] après avoir perdu toutes ses vies très irritante par moments, les niveaux devenant laborieux après avoir été joués et rejoués juste pour retenter sa chance à un passage précis.

Au final, Kero Blaster est agréable et je le recommande, mais il n'invente rien de spécial et ne fait pas particulièrement preuve de génie, sa principale spécificité venant de son atmosphère extrêmement japonaise: la première quête du jeu met en scène des créatures rappelant le folklore japonais, et la seconde quête, le "Zangyou Mode", se moque de la culture du travail sévissant dans l'archipel nippon. Rien de tout cela ne casse cinq pattes à un crapaud, mais j'ai passé un bon moment, à vous de voir si ce sera aussi votre cas...

38681567.review:
优秀的游戏

复古的风格和复古的手感
一开始以为是像超级玛丽的游戏，越玩越感觉像是洛克人
武器升级系统，血罐，加血条，都看到了洛克人的影子

游戏本身确实是存在难度（特别是你武器没升级的时候），最终boss部分很人性化的帮你保留阶段（第一阶段boss打完了死没命了，重玩再回到这里直接开始第二阶段boss）

有种小时候玩洛克人的感觉吧，在几个地方死去活来的，

但是为了升级武器，为了血瓶，这些东西需要你（稍微）刷刷钱
这个稍微，让我有点不适

这个游戏是个类似始祖洛克人的变种游戏，不喜欢这类游戏或者手残玩家，真的慎入
对于喜欢这类游戏的人，游戏真的挺不错，看情况可以入一个

38675106.review: Veramente un bellissimo gioco, per me non ha difetti, è uno dei miei platform preferiti.

38558326.review:
Pixel Art: 3/5 (Basic but cute)
Immersion: 3/5
Gameplay: 3.5/5 
Controls: 2.5/5 (Some control issues)
Value: 3/5 
Difficulty: 3/5 (100% is where the challenge)
--------------
Overall 3.0 (Difficulty always excluded)

[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/31208751/]Please follow my Pixel Art Curation for other great games...[/url]


This is a nice little retro pixelated platformer, with a cute little story and characters that accompanies :)

You are a lizard like creature who is working to clean up some kind of infestation.  You start with basic jump and fire, but discover up to 4 different weapons and some additional skills like double jumping.

It has a nice little leveling system for your character and the weapons, growing your health, the weapons damage and behaviors.

BONUS:  There are a few free little submission games that are a part of this story as well, check out [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197964345647/recommended/409670]Pink Hour[/url] as well :)

ACHIEVEMENTS:  They can be quite challenging, so 100% will not be for everybody.


ISSUES:  The controls are very slow, clunky and not very responsive...precise jumping is a challenge.

38519072.review: Really happy I bought this on sale and played through. Very cool game.lots of platformer fun. Definitely recommend if you like retro action platformer type games like I do.

38516296.review: Hidden gem for sure! Captivating art and characters, tight platforming, a significant but not overwhelming sense of challenge. Music works very well with the game to create a familiar, welcoming environment and the world is a pleasure to navigate through. I got this through Humble Bundle, and I'm not sure I would pay full price, but this is an excellent game that is sure to make an impression on you if you enjoy platformers.

38267122.review:
It's interesting how great games like this one can be swept under the radar, especially from critically-acclaimed developers like Pixel, the creators of Cave Story.
Just ignore the fact that you're a... frog.. janitor.... thing.. and you're in for a real treat.

[h1] PROS [/h1]

[b] +No annoying tutorial. [/b]
I was amazed that the game was able to teach you how to play the ENTIRE game with nothing but thirty seconds on the title screen.

[b] +Cute characters. [/b]

[b] +Tight platforming and shooting gameplay. [/b]
This game is essentially Cave Story mixed with Contra.  It kind of reminds me of Mega Man in the sense that your character has some weight on him allowing you to make presice movements. 

[b] +Simple and old-school, yet still gives quite the challenge. [/b]

[b] +Fair, balanced, and fun upgrade system. [/b]
Lots of weapons to add to your arsenal with satisying upgrades to make then pack an even bigger punch. Bubbles, spreadshots, wide beams, long-range bullets, and a straight up flamethrower. You can also buy health upgrades, so you get to choose whether firepower or stamina is more important to you.

[b] +Fun, challenging, and varied boss fights. [/b]

[b] +Wide enemy variety. [/b]

[b] +Really catchy soundtrack. [/b]

[b] +Retro-styled games are badass. [/b]

[h1] CONS [/h1]

[b] -It's just... alright. [/b]
Dont get me wrong, I think this game is really good; good little story, good mechanics, good style. But that's all it really is... good.

[b] -Never uses it's mechanics to it's full potential. [/b]

[b] -Never does anything gameplay wise that we've never seen before. [/b]

[b] -The length of the game. [/b]
Definitely Kero Blasters biggest issue.  With only seven stages, and several game overs, the game only took about three hours to beat.  That being said, there is a boss rush mode as well as a new game plus, and for an eight dollar game, I guess it's a fair price for the amount of content provided.

[h1] CONCLUSION [/h1]

Kero Blaster is a simple, short, fun retro game made by Pixel.  There's really nothing more to say about it than that.  Also, if you want my honest opinion on which version you should get, PC vs IOS... get the IOS version.  It controls better since you can lock your aiming direction in one place so you can still focus on your platforming, and you can take it with you anywhere which is always a plus.

[h1] Overall score: 8/10 [/h1]

38235692.review:
Petit action-platformer pixelisé fort sympathique. Si vous avez aimé Cave Story, vous allez sûrement aimer celui-là !
On y perd le côté "monde ouvert" (limité certes, mais présent) de Cave Story, mais on y gagne en finesse et en rythme. Enfin bref, que du bon !
